content.detailedDescription: It darted across the sky bobbled up and down twice then took off in the direction of a jet liner north came close to the jet, it stopped at the jet then disappeared.  my son ran in the house to get the telescope but it disappeared before he could get it set up and focused on the object.  my son, his 3 children, my other 3 grand children, my husband and i all witness this take place.
content.summary: It darted across the sky bobbled up and down twice then took off in the direction of a jet liner north came close to the jet like stopped at the jet then disappeared

content.detailedDescription: I was heading down huntingdon st just after i turned off aramingo ave at about 132am and the area of sky above the street ahead of me a huge, green ball of light was going straight then it went up and then down and angled to the left, but it was so fast and it disappeared.  i stopped to see if anyone else seen anything, but it was late and no one was around and as i drove around i tried to find it again, but nothing.
content.summary: Green ball of light

content.detailedDescription:
As our group of 3 friends were driving down back roads through ferrum virginia immediately after a brief rain storm, two lights which looked like directed car headlights appeared in the sky to our left. we slowed down and observed as it flew through clouds and descended then reascended. the craft then headed our direction low silent and rather slowly. once it got closer it was approx. 50-70 ft high and moved directly over our vehicle. as it moved closer it appeared as three yellow\orange lights in a black triangle. it followed over us briefly and one friend\witness described 4 lights and pyramid like shape. it then passed over us towards the other direction, picking up speed, still silent, until it was out of view. afterwards lightning strikes were scene in the area for approx. 1 1\2 hours. 




we tried to capture video with a small ipod touch, the object had already passed us on its way into the distance when the recording began. the object in the video is extremely small, without reference points of detail of lights or shape. (in other words the video was useless)
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Other
content.summary: Hovering 2 directed lights, acended, decended, and changed path twoards vehicle then saw 3 to 4 lights on craft as it passed

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing at the back of my deck. the deck is 12 + feet off the ground at the back of the house. it is a wrap around the house deck, ending on each side at the carport. the time was at 6:40 am est. i know because i had just taken my daughter to the bus for school and got back home. i always make a cup of coffee and go out on the deck when the mornings are nice. the weather was abnormally calm and warm. 
while standing on the far left of the deck , leaning on the railings , i felt someone to the right of me. my husband hadn't left for work yet.I wasn't frightened. when i turned my head to look this human shaped solid black , very dark black , being was standing on the other side of my deck. it was turned towards the field , leaning on the railings, seemed to be looking into the field. i was speechless, but not scared. when it turned it's head to look at me it began slowly moving backwards. the legs moved as if it were walking backwards, yet it was floating very slowly. cat like movements, like when a cat is stalking it's prey?  the being dissappeared behind that side of the house and i am still standing there like an idiot dumbfounded. then it peeked half it's body back around and stared at me for a moment. when it left this time also slow it dragged it's hand across the wood. the black hand is the last i saw of the being. i ran to the front of the deck. across the carport and looked, there was nothing there.    while it was first moving backward i got a very calm warming feeling. then i felt guilty because i had interupted this beings peaceful morning? i never felt in harms way until it came back and peeked at me. nothing was said but i got the feeling that it relayed the message," i'm not going to hurt you today, but i could if i wanted to." 
so, now i am terriffied to be outside after dark alone. mornings on the deck are not happenning. i keep every light on all the time. 
this being was so dark black that there was a huge contrast between it and the morning light on the deck. there were no facial features at all. it was not another human standing there. i saw another being.
02/29/2012 evening presented the most amazing lightening storms that i have ever seen in this area. i think there is a connection.
i never heard any plane or helicopter or anything else flying overhead.
several days earlier my daughter and i did see what looked like a huge metorite or " falling star ". it fell from west to east. didn't associate that with anything. we see " falling stars " a lot in this area.  i will pay more attention from now on, maybe they aren't stars?
so , that is my "i saw an alien on my deck story."   it is true. i am scared. i now believe that they exist and will start preparing to defend myself against them since i did feel threatened in the end. like i know how to prepare for something like that? the light weren't on. on that side of the deck that morning. and why was it at my house!!!!!!!!
content.summary: Solid black mass. human shaped. 6ft tall. thin build.

content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed after family day i believe it was thanksgiving, my sister was staying over.I laid down and something through the window caught my eye. i watched it for a while, i was stunned. it was very close it was disc shaped with very bright lights it seemed to be rotating but it could have been the light sequence. the colirs of the lights are very bright and seem to have no pattern but alternate between color and white. i saw my sister heading to the bathroom and called her in to see it. she watched with me a while. i went and got my video camera it is an older sony version.I began taping it through the window. my sister said ,wierd i do not hear any sound. i too could hear nothing. we went out on the back porch to see if we could hear anything or get a better view, i expected to be gone. it remained in the sky for hours. i taped alot and then i was starting to get freaked out. i felt weird looking at it. it moved slightly from time to time first straight up then back down very fast with no sound at all. my son told me he saw it a month or so later on the other side if our house, he video taped it on his cell phone. my sister was up this last weekend and we saw it again, we were in my jacuzzi and after going into the house we came back and it was gone. my husband and brother in law also saw it and my h that first night.
content.summary: Ufo spotted and video taped through window and then off my back porch in cottonwood az

content.detailedDescription: I was going to bed after family day i believe it was thanksgiving, my sister was staying over.I laid down and something through the window caught my eye. i watched it for a while, i was stunned. it was very close it was disc shaped with very bright lights it seemed to be rotating but it could have been the light sequence. the colirs of the lights are very bright and seem to have no pattern but alternate between color and white. i saw my sister heading to the bathroom and called her in to see it. she watched with me a while. i went and got my video camera it is an older sony version.I began taping it through the window. my sister said ,wierd i do not hear any sound. i too could hear nothing. we went out on the back porch to see if we could hear anything or get a better view, i expected to be gone. it remained in the sky for hours. i taped alot and then i was starting to get freaked out. i felt weird looking at it. it moved slightly from time to time first straight up then back down very fast with no sound at all. my son told me he saw it a month or so later on the other side if our house, he video taped it on his cell phone. my sister was up this last weekend and we saw it again, we were in my jacuzzi and after going into the house we came back and it was gone. my husband and brother in law also saw it and my h that first night.
content.summary: Ufo spotted and video taped through window and then off my back porch in cottonwood az

content.detailedDescription: I was going outside to smoke a cigarette, as soon as i opend the front door a bright white light shot straight across the sky at speeds that were mind boggling to me at first i thought it may have been a shooting star but then i realized that it wasnt considering it didnt have any sort of tail and it was traveling in a straight path before disapeering behind the trees and a house.
content.summary: Went outside to smoke as soon as i opend door a bright white light shot across the sky

content.detailedDescription: I took my dogs out in the backyard as have done countless times over 8 years here. as i was standing there looking at the night sky as normal, but this time i saw something different. i noticed what at first i thought was a very low shooting star. in the half second it took to realize this was no shooting star it broke from one solid object into 3 separate orbs. these orbs very quickly fell into formation of a perfect triangle for about one second before taking more of a wide v formation as it disappeared behind trees. the whole event did not take more than 5 seconds total. the object/objects never changed heading or speed during the entire time and was moving much faster than planes i have ever seen fly over this area, and being over the flight path of lambert airport, and 3 smaller airports i have seen all type of plane fly over from commercial, single engine, to military jets. i have never seen anything that has even come close to what i had seen. the object started as a streak of blue-white light with a tail of matching light similar to a comet or shooting star. after it broke it seemed to have much less light, but still same color as it started. wish i had anything record it with, but ain't that the way!
content.summary: Started as fireball/comet broke to 3 orbs in formations

content.detailedDescription: It was aproximately 2 a.M. on july the 17th 2011 in redmond, washington. a friend and i were outside on a back porch. i remember noticing that there were no 'stars' visible at the time except for one which was rather large and bright. after a few moments of i presumed it to be venus because of it's large size and brightness. it was bluish white. there were no aircraft flying around and it was quite silent. then suddenly, i realized that the 'star' was kind of 'wobbleing', moving to the left and to the right and changeing it's altitude slightly; going up and down a few degrees. my friend and i watched for at least five minutes as the object suddenly appeared to display three or four, smaller, secondary lights that were basically 'orbiting' the main, central light, but not in a fixed manner. the overall impression was that of a 'amorphous' or 'shape-changing' structure. i remember thinking that object could not have been more than a mile away because its lights illuminated the small clouds that were nearby. at one point the object was inside or behind the clouds but was still very visible because they were so bright. the object slowly moved up and away from us before vanishing completely. the objects location was seen approximately to the north-east of the new virginia mason hospital in redmond. the object was initially fairly low in the sky; maybe 30-35 degrees from the horizon. also the object made absolutely no sound.
content.summary: Ufo was stationary initially, hovering. then moved to the left and to the right and eventually moved up and away until it was no longer visible.

content.detailedDescription:
On february 25th, 2012, around 8:30 pm, i was using my kick/punch bag in the backyard when i looked up and saw a ball of light heading east towards lake washington. its path curved slightly south and i watched for about 90 seconds before it disappeared behind a cloud. i continued to keep watch and observed a commercial plane at very high altitude. moments later the ball of light emerged from behind the clouds, now heading north. it continued north towards mount baker and i watched for another two minutes until it was too faint to see. 

i was unphased and had no reaction other than making practical observations.
content.summary: Ball of light observed over north seattle

content.detailedDescription: On 2/29/12 at about 9 pm i and 100 to 200 people were watching an outdoor movie at a park at 17th st and washington on miami beach. my friend julie pointed to the sky to the right of me, north of our position. i saw approximately 12-15 solid orange bright, steady lights moving from east to west. they were scattered across the sky - some appearing further away than others by the relative size and brightness of the light. they were at varied degrees off the horizon, approximately 30 to 45 degrees in range. the lights traveled in a slight rise from a lower position in the east to higher positions in the west. as we watched, several other identical lights appeared from the east and traveled in their own rising path westward. several of us watched and wondered out loud what they were. i tried to take a picture with my phone, but it shows only a tiny pinprick of light. the lights moved at a steady pace, eventually fading into the cloud cover west of our position.
content.summary: About 20 orange lights moved in scattered, staggered arc from east to west at varied degrees fading into cloud cover

content.detailedDescription: Was watching the skies as usual while the family was driving us to go eat, focusing on a jet at the time. it was almost directly above me when i saw a white light suddenly appear in front of it. it accelerated with starting speed and missed the jet from above, slowing and halting in probably 1 second flat. it hovered as i sat bewildered. i wanted to get a size comparison of the light itself and the jet, but at the time the jet had moved on behind the roof of the car, so i had to crane my neck to see it. by the time i looked back to find the light, it had disappeared and i didn't see it again afterwards. from my memory, it was probably either the same size as the jet, or a little over half the size.
content.summary: Was watching a jet fly when suddenly, a white light appeared and charged the jet extremely fast. missing it from above, it halted almost immediately and hovered. it soon disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: My girlfriend and i were outside the night on 2-29-12 looking at stars an dthe moon through my 8" dobsonian telescope when i saw a dark cone shaped object pass in front of the moon moving from left to right following teh shadow line. i was not sure what it was and i looked for any type od object that was visible and there was nothing i could see.  so i proceded to try to take a picture of the moon when i saw it again this time dropping down from the top and arcing to the right going the other direction this time.  i took another picture right after and the objet was gone.  i looked further for 10 minutes and i was not able to locate anything.  there were aircraft in the area because we live along the flight path to port columbus airport but none of them were close to the moon at that point in time.  i tried for 15 minutes to replicate the shadow thinking it might be a flare or glitch on the camera but i was not able to create it again.  we searched for bird and bats and nothing found.  there was varied clouds moving across the sky but again nothing close to the moon at that point in time.  i have no idea what it was i saw but i found it interesting.  i have two pictures that i took of this event. the first shows the cone shaped object and the second picture taken just seconds later the object is gone.
content.summary: Dark cone shape passing over the moon

content.detailedDescription: I was taking the dog out for the night approx.930 pm.I was looking at the cloud cover and wondering if was going to snow or what have you .The cloud cover was low.When he was done going we started to head in and i notice a very large object just over the trees in a trapazoid shape 4 or 5 lights on the edges and every so often a beam or smaller lights would connect the bigger ones.This object was moving extremely slow and thought it was going to land in fields but it kept going, sinking beyond the tree line at a distance.
content.summary: Walking dog.Looking around up noticing a cloud cover.Walking back to entrance of house and saw over the tree line approx 1/2 mile or less away large object with 4 or 5  white lights in a shape of a trapazoide and smaller light shining between the larger .

content.detailedDescription:
First of two sightings,1952, riding a bycicle in rural area 1:00 am
12 years old headin home across a field, sensed something, 
looked up and saw a fireball, slow, orange, red, with  blue/white edges. 
softball? size, south to north. (near lat. 33.) cousin and i were scared
went home mom wasnt interested and we forgot about it. 
2nd sighting 1962 approx. 1-2:00 am 1/4 mile from first sighting. 
leaving mom's house heading for el cajon, ca. about 15miles away. 
on gravel road on a high ridge going east, girlfriend says look a car's lights
comming up the valley, below us. not many cars out there at that date. 
watching the "car" lights a mile and half away down the alley, we saw
that the lights weren't on the road but near it, rough brush canyon lands. 
we were going east along a ridge, light heading east down below
in the valley. we continued east then down off the ridge to the north
turned onto a paved road going west towards the light now at our level
less than 1/4 mile away over a canyon on our level, hovering i pulled over and 
and stopped, the two girls were screaming wanting to get out of there. 
i rolled the window down, no sound, turned the lights off, no reflection. 
girls screaming, i said, i'll flash the lights and call them over. 
i flashed the lights and the bright white light like a street light but
way brighter started moving back to the west on the same path. 
we followed the light at about 45, 50 mph, we were on a curvy road,
it moving in a direct line, we went around a hill and the light was
about 300 ft high now. we were going down into the valley, the light
stayed level. another 1/2 mile we were 1 mile behind the light and
light was about 6-700 ft high. another hill to go around and we were
farther behind. we lost sight of the light for about 8 min. till we reached
a high ridge about 8 miles from el cajon, the light was over el cajon. 
we were able to watch the light most of the way back to el cajon and
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path then hovering,Other
content.summary: 1st crash ? 2nd craft hunting for crash site ? on kcbq radio light over ocean first sighting 1952 slow fireball n to s crashing,?,2nd sighting same exact spot 1962 bright orb from over ocean to my site, hover then return to ocean

content.detailedDescription: Wife and i were driving when we observed an object stationary in the sky. we thought it was a plane but it didn't move. we pulled over to observe it closer. i got out of car watching it and it never moved or made a sound and it was close enough that if it was just a normal plane it should have made some sort of sound. after an indeterminate time i got back in car. my wife was adamant she never got out of car but when we got home we both had gravel in our sneakers. strange thing was we somehow lost track of time and didn't realize till we had driven away that the plane or object or whatever was gone. don't remember it ever moving. stranger still, later that month i received a phone call from a man asking if i had observed anything strange in the sky lately. he knew my first name but had my last name wrong. he invited me to a meeting of a supposedly private group of people interested in ufo's but the meeting was to be held at a nearby navel base. i decided not to go and that was the end of the incident, but my wife and i still are concerned that we seemed to have misplaced some time and we never did see the object move away. it just seemed to have vanished.
content.summary: Seemed like large transport plane with stubby wings

content.detailedDescription:
My father and i were walking our two dogs like we do on a weekly basis. it was about 10 pm and it was not cloudy. the stars shone bright, as usual. it was not an especially cold or windy night for february. we live on a desolate street with no streetlights and a lot of trees. however, we were not anywhere near the woods when we saw a bight orange orb coming towards us. it was above some houses and trees, descending, getting closer and appearing larger. we stood still. our dogs did not seem to notice. it moved drifted continuously nearer as we stared at it. neither of us had a camera or phone. the bright orb seemed to hover and have control over its movements. as it got nearer, i could see it had something like tentacles with the bottom being longer in length. it was bright, but looked like it had some transparency. it did not resemble a spaceship or aircraft of any kind. it was more like a star, but was definitely not a star or meteor. in my opinion, it had the characteristics of a dandelion blowing in the wind. 
after watching it for two or three minutes, i decided to give my dog leash to my dad, and i began to run back towards the house to get a camera. as soon as i did so, the object began to ascend further away. it seemed to be moving in a straight line parallel to me, while also getting farther away and fading in color. it was gone by the time i got to our house. there were no more traces of it that night or the following night when we went on a walk at the same time.  
my father and i are amazed at the sighting. we agree it was not a plane or helicopter, but he wants to believe there is a more logical explanation. at the time, however, we were both amazed by the bright object. it was memorizing.
content.summary: Bright orange star-like orb, almost like a jelly-fish, longer at the bottom

content.detailedDescription:
Was traveling along us 62/180 from el paso tx, east towards nm border. event occured at approximately 6-6:30 local time. observation was made as the sun set on a particularly dusty texas evening.  approximately 5-10 miles from border patrol check point i noticed a light in the sky coming from the direction i was heading, traveling very low. 
initial thought was something that low would be a helicopter.  it was apparent it was not a star or even a plane, but something flying. a fairly bright light and a pulsating light from underneath (much like those on "conventional" aircraft made discernment easy that this was not a star, planet, etc.).
there is an airport in the area, though the flight path of the airliners could be seen a few miles later in the drive coming from the east, but on the opposite side of the road.  the object i saw was on the right side of the road, with the airliners flying in on the left.  the airliners were noticed after this sighting, and helped me discern this was not an airliner either.
it should also be noted there is a military base in the area as well. fort bliss and biggs army airfield.  both in the general direction of where the craft was heading.
as i approached the craft on 62/180, it was close enough to the road for me to open my sun roof cover, not the window, to look at the object from underneath.  it did not fly right over the road, but close enough to see "under(?)" it displaying three lights at three points, revealing a triangle shape.  also visible was the flashing light as described above.  
reaction, "this is not a helicopter, and it is moving slow."  not slow enough to track with a car (because believe me, i tried after pulling over, waiting for a car to pass and turning around), but slow enough that, without witnessing jets with flames shooting out the back or anything of the sort propelling the craft - or causing it to hover (like helicopter blades), that this thing was different, it was powerful (to be kept aloft like that) and it was, to at least this layman, unidentified, for sure.  
my first reaction was to pull over and listen for jets, etc, as i couldn't see anything of the sort, but once i realized the craft was not a helicopter, i had to slow, pull off and roll down the window.  it was a fairly windy night and i cannot accurately report if the craft emmitted noise or not.  i have the feeling, though, if it was that close to me moving that slow, i would've heard something.  so if it wasn't 'silent' it was at least 'quiet.'
after making the turn (and again, not seeing any sort of propulsion means from what i would guess is the 'rear (?)' of the craft and trying to track it on the highway (thinking of travis walton, famously saying, 'i should've stayed in the truck), i realized it had gained too much distance between us as i was waiting on cars to pass, etc.  this did allow for the observation of the "rear" and no visible means of propulsion. 
feelings were that of awe.  a large, slow moving triangle, with no visible propulsion means was new to me.  the triangle seemed to be fairly "thick"
gut tells me this is government owned/operated and hasn't been disclosed to the public a la the stealth bomber a few decades ago, as i was in the vicinity of the military bases, described above.  the flashing center light was also reminiscent of commercial craft/public craft. 
dimensions: triangle.
lights: 4 visible.  one pulsating in the center, (maybe a little off center) and three yellowish/white lights at the points of the triangle, but not flush with the points, the craft continued approx. 2-3 feet beyond the lights
propulsion: no helicopter blades, flames emmited from afterburners.
sound: unsure.  seems i should've heard something.
no additional evidence - only visual sighting.
content.summary: Traveling along us 62/180, past border patrol station (approx 5 -10 miles) saw triangular object, three lights at each point slowly fly along highway toward el paso, tx (military base in area).  did not hear sounds, though i was on highway traveling fast.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving east on 321 in hampton,tn until i had reached my destination near brown's store in hampton.I parked at 9:15pm facing west and as soon as i exited my car i could see something larger than any star i have ever seen directly in my horizontal 12o'clock vision,hovering above the mountain parallel to rittertown rd in the west.I stood still to focus on what i was seeing was something that could be explainable and when i realized it wasn't,i grabbed my phone and tried to record it.But when i looked through my lens,it just looked like a stationary large star because it wasn't yet moving,so i felt that it wouldn't really show or prove anythng(a decision i'd later regret).I then texted my husband to come out to witness what i was seeing.When he did,the object when from looking like a very large white star to a metallic sparkling shapeshifting object.I can't explain it in words but i have seen similar objects on other ufo videos.That's when i really knew what i was seeing.It started slowly moving from side to side,up and down,but still directly above the treeline at the top of the mountain.Then it started an obvious decent behind the mountain to where we could faintly see beams of reflective light behind the trees.It hovered near the treeline a few more seconds,then disappeared behind the mountain and that was the last time we saw it.I would have recorded it for sure if it had been moving and hovering when i first saw it.I also wish i would have driven on 19-e towards elizabethon to see if i could have seen it on the backside of that mountain but i had commitments at the time.This is the only time i'm 100% positive of what i saw.My husband is as well.
content.summary: Mimicking very large star then into a shapeshifting,sparkly metallic craft with faint light beams

content.detailedDescription: I have been observing these on a daily basis over the last 2 months. i keep taking a few photos everyday hoping to get one with very good detail. that has eluded me so far, increasing my curiosity. how did they come to be here? do they want anything? why so many in the sky?
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo' over sherwood park

content.detailedDescription:
In lagrange at a friends house and came outside to smoke  a cigarette. looked up and noticed this object that was very bright almost star like.
it was ascending and descending. pulsating. my reaction was calm since i have been watching these things for awhile now. i eventually left my friendws house and it was close to dawn so it was getting lighter outside and i lost sight of it.
content.summary: Was moving very slowly a bluish/white at times very bright starlike with dimension

content.detailedDescription: My husband was outside having a smoke and out of the corner of his eye to his left he saw a streak of light come in to view then stopped. trying to understand what he just seen he focused in on the sudden sedentary object. as he focused it dropped suddenly with a sharp stop then just as quick it made a hard upward right angle dart then suddenly stopped again then slowly drifted. that's when i heard him calling "honey,honey, come out here quick!!!". i ran outside to see what was going on and my husband pointed out to me the bright solid moving light. i just stood there staring and said "it can't be a plane because there is no red & blue lights & i see no airplane wings and no flashing white light like an airplane has." then my husband said he was going in to grab the camcorder. i stood there and kept my eyes on the object and never took then off it. he came out the back door and said "where is it?" all i could say was "it's gone. it just blinked out like someone turned off a light switch. just like that it was gone. then my husband said "#@!$&**" "&^#@*&^" and so on!
content.flightPath: Stationary,Hovering then path,Straight-line path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Light steak suddenly in view then stopped quickly went down then fast 60 *turn then slow  50 miles then blinked out.

content.detailedDescription: Around 9pm on 02/28/2012(for about 45 minutes), police, resuce and firetrucks were passing by our house.  my husband and i assumed there might be a fire in an old farm house, as there are a lot of older farm homes in the area we live in.  we were wathcing a movie in our living room in front of a large bay window.  about 15 minutes after we noticed the last emergency vehicle drive by, at 10:03pm a very large, glowing green object seemed to shoot across the sky in the direction that the emergency vehicles had headed.  there was no sound.  my husband and i both stood up and i turned off the tv immediately.  we listened for about 5 minutes for a crash (we both assumed at first that it must have been a plane "falling" out of the sky).  we never heard any sounds.  we stared outside for a while and there was nothing unusual.  about 1/2 an hour after that the emergency vehicles started coming back in the opposite direction with no sirens or lights.  we watched the local news at 11:00pm and there was no mention of any of this.  i logged into the news station's facebook site to see if there was any talk about this because it was so odd and several other people posted seeing something glowing/shooting across the sky in multiple other towns.  we went to bed assuming it would be on the morning news, but still nothing and no posts other than the people like myself on the news site.  i have never seen anything like this.  i have seen meteor showers/shooting stars/low flying airplanes, this did not look anything like those things.  i was thankful that my husband was there because the whole thing was very strange. i also don't think we would have believed each other if we hadn't both seen it.
content.summary: At 10:03pm my husband and i noticed a very large glowing green object shoot across the sky.

content.detailedDescription: This one did not upload with the rest. trying again.
content.summary: One more photo for edmonton report

content.detailedDescription: The attached photos were all taken on the morning of feb 27, 2012. the first photo was taken from my back window before i left for work. the other two were taken when i got to work. my office window faces west with a view of edmonton. the question is not, "do they exist?", but "why have they suddenly taken such an interest in the edmonton area?"
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change
content.summary: Ufo activity is increasing over the edmonton area.

content.detailedDescription: On 02/27/2012 i was sitting having lunch at 12:39 pm, i am faceing the window, its a clear blue sky with no clouds, i am speaking on the phone with m. as i look up, i see a white, disc shaped aspirin like round object moving really fast as it appears its being chased by 3 fighter jets blowing white smoke from their tails ends, but the object was in front of the jets in a much much faster speed, they could not keep up with the object. i sit and tell my friend i want to tell you something that i am seeing and i know youre not going to believe me, so i won't say anything, so he tells me tell me what is it. and this is what i saw. this disc shaped white aspirin life object appears is being chased by three fighter jets and they could not keep up the pace or speed of this object.
content.summary: It appeared white aspirin dic shaped being chased by three flighter jets,.

content.detailedDescription:
This is not the first sighting of object.  it is in the area where "jupiter" would be and we used the same telescope in the past to view jupiter which was entirely different.  this object had the same description of the investigator in kentucky.  it had what seemed like a small black nucleus with "spikes" of different colors shooting out from the center.  it moved or swayed and the colors were predominately yellow to green then blue then purple.  the spikes seemed to shift. 
     a dinner guest went outside with me to view it also...He described it as a pattern of a "kiwi" cut in half.  i was not the only one who saw this.  clouds were moving in so no picture is available.  
thank you for your time...
content.summary: Same description from field investigator in kentucky

content.detailedDescription: I came home from work i went outside to my patio to smoke, and during i looked up in the sky to watch the stars, it relaxes me. i happened to see a siluette above me and followed the siluette and noticed it was a ufo.  shocked, i just stood there in awe following it with my eyes as it hovered in a straight path until it was gone.  no noise at all, almost a slight low tone pulsating sound, everything was quite and seemed to be the only thing i could hear.
content.summary: Siluette with redish black circles on all three sides
